properties.description: This pipeline is used to send reports to the respective teams based on the dataset_group running

activities.name: LU-Metadata
activities.description: This activity pulls the details of the snowflake table and blob location from khc_enggextract_metadata table which needs to extracted.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select application_name,
dataset_name,
dataset_group,
adf_trigger_name,
snowflake_role,
warehouse_size,
snowflake_database,
snowflake_schema,
base_table_name,
snowflake_stage_name,
snowflake_file_format,
copy_options,
container_name,
extract_blob_location,
extract_archival_blob_name,
replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(extract_file_name,'<yyyy>','*'),'<MM>','*'),'<dd>','*'),'<hh24>','*'),'<ss>','*') as extract_file_name,
server_name,
replace(sftp_path, '<env>', '@{variables('env')}') as sftp_path,
sftp_copy_ind,
active_ind
from khc_enggextract_metadata where application_name= '@{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName}' and dataset_group = '@{pipeline().parameters.Dataset_group}' and dataset_name <>'@{pipeline().parameters.Dataset_group}' and active_ind = 'y'

activities.name: set_env_variable
activities.description: Set the variable - ENV from global parameters - AZURE_ENV

activities.name: ForEach-LU
activities.description: Loops over the inner activities for each entry of the metadata

activities.name: Lookup_file
activities.description: Reads the extract file

activities.name: Switch-emailsender
activities.description: switch to send the email with or without attachment based on the dataset_group condition and data available in extracts

activities.name: EmailSender_FDMEE_Withattachment
activities.description: This activity sends the success email when the pipeline is successfully completed and share the fdmee differences as report

body.value:
{ "to_email":"@{variables('to_emails_it_finance_and_da')}", "subject":"SST NA MEC unmapped fpls changes", "body": "Data Load and extract process has been completed Successfully for application @{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName}. The pipelinename is @{pipeline().Pipeline}. The pipelineid is @{pipeline().RunId}. The Dataset name is @{pipeline().parameters.Dataset_group}.
Please find the attached FDMEE product mapping changes.", "attachment_path":"@{concat('khc-enterprise-data/',item().extract_blob_location,item().extract_file_name)}", "importance": "Low" }

activities.name: EmailSender_FDMEE_Withoutattachment
activities.description: This activity sends the success email when the pipeline is successfully completed and there are no fdmee differences.

activities.name: EmailSender_CatalystKickout_Withattachment
activities.description: This activity sends the success email when the pipeline is successfully completed and share the Catalyst Kickout Report report

body.value:
{ "to_email":"@{variables('to_emails_it_finance_and_da')}", "subject":"SST NA Kickout Report", "body": "Data Load and extract process has been completed Successfully for application @{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName}. The pipelinename is @{pipeline().Pipeline}. The pipelineid is @{pipeline().RunId}. The Dataset name is @{pipeline().parameters.Dataset_group}.
This report provides all metadata kickouts as well as product kickouts and that it hasn’t been mapped to a product because the entry was booked at the company code and profit center. Usually JET entries.", "attachment_path":"@{concat('khc-enterprise-data/',item().extract_blob_location,item().extract_file_name)}", "importance": "Low" }

activities.name: EmailSender_CatalystKickout_Withoutattachment
activities.description: This activity sends the success email when the pipeline is successfully completed and no Metadata Kickouts were found.

activities.name: EmailSender_PreAllocation_Checks_Success
activities.description: This activity sends the success email when the pipeline is successfully completed and displays validation check results in body of email.

activities.name: EmailSender_PreAllocation_Checks_Failure
activities.description: This activity sends the email when the pipeline is successfully completed and no validation check data is found in output.

activities.name: EmailSender_PostAllocation_Validation_Withattachment
activities.description: This activity sends the success email when the pipeline is successfully completed and share the post allocation validation checks as report.

activities.name: EmailSender_PostAllocation_Validation_Withoutattachment
activities.description: This activity sends the success email when the pipeline is successfully completed and no validation results found

activities.name: EmailSender_Rates_check_Withattachment
activities.description: This activity sends the success email when the pipeline is successfully completed and share the rates check report

body.value:
{ "to_email":"@{variables('to_emails_data_assurance')}", "subject":"SST NA Missing Throughput Keys", "body": "Data Load and extract process has been completed Successfully for application @{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName}. The pipelinename is @{pipeline().Pipeline}. The pipelineid is @{pipeline().RunId}. The Dataset name is @{pipeline().parameters.Dataset_group}.
This report shows the missing throughput keys by period. Action required by the logistic team to provide the rates.", "attachment_path":"@{concat('khc-enterprise-data/',item().extract_blob_location,item().extract_file_name)}", "importance": "Low" }

activities.name: EmailSender_Rates_check_Withoutattachment
activities.description: This activity sends the success email when the pipeline is successfully completed and no missing rates were found.

activities.name: EmailSender_Royalties_Withattachment
activities.description: This activity sends the success email when the pipeline is successfully completed and share the Royalties data as export

body.value:
{ "to_email":"@{variables('to_emails_it_finance')}", "subject":"SST NA Royalties data", "body": "Data Load and extract process has been completed Successfully for application @{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName}. The pipelinename is @{pipeline().Pipeline}. The pipelineid is @{pipeline().RunId}. The Dataset name is @{pipeline().parameters.Dataset_group}.
This file is for the AFH process indicating the file has been loaded in snowflake.", "attachment_path":"@{concat('khc-enterprise-data/',item().extract_blob_location,item().extract_file_name)}", "importance": "Low" }

activities.description: This activity sends the success email when the pipeline is successfully completed and share the crossbu report as export

body.value:

activities.name: EmailSender_allocation_validation_data_Withattachment
activities.description: This activity sends the success email when the pipeline is successfully completed and share the na allocation validation extracts

body.value:
{ "to_email":"@{variables('to_emails_data_assurance')}", "subject":"SST NA Working vs Loaded", "body": "Data Load and extract process has been completed Successfully for application @{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName}. The pipelinename is @{pipeline().Pipeline}. The pipelineid is @{pipeline().RunId}. The Dataset name is @{pipeline().parameters.Dataset_group}.
This report shows the variance between loaded and working by account.", "attachment_path":"@{concat('khc-enterprise-data/',item().extract_blob_location,item().extract_file_name)}", "importance": "Low" }

activities.name: EmailSender_allocation_validation_Withoutattachment
activities.description: This activity sends the success email when the pipeline is successfully completed and Validation is successful.No records were found with difference amount greater than 1.

activities.name: EmailSender_allocation_epm_validation_Withattachment
activities.description: This activity sends the success email when the pipeline is successfully completed and share the epm allocation validation extracts

body.value:
{ "to_email":"@{variables('to_emails_data_assurance')}", "subject":"SST NA Sum of Parts Report", "body": "Data Load and extract process has been completed Successfully for application @{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName}. The pipelinename is @{pipeline().Pipeline}. The pipelineid is @{pipeline().RunId}. The Dataset name is @{pipeline().parameters.Dataset_group}.
This report shows the sum of parts where you have the total epm not equaling the total product (column D-E). The difference is usually attributed to products without NSV or GSV.", "attachment_path":"@{concat('khc-enterprise-data/',item().extract_blob_location,item().extract_file_name)}", "importance": "Low" }

activities.name: EmailSender_allocation_epm_validation_Withoutattachment
activities.description: This activity sends the success email when the pipeline is successfully completed and no epm validations were found.

activities.name: SP-PipelineStart
activities.description: This Activity logs starting of pipeline in khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-PipelineSuccess
activities.description: This activity logs pipeline success in audit log

activities.name: SP-PipelineFailed
activities.description: This activity logs pipeline failure in audit log
